front.title: A Strawman proposal for HTTPS as a PIDF-LO Transport Protocol

abstract.t: This document describes a strawman approach to using HTTP (HTTP) over TLS (TLS) with Digest Authentication to transport PIDF-LO (RFC 4119) objects. It is a GEOPRIV transport protocol as described in section 5.2 or RFC 3693 (RFC 3693)
